segments.text: I would like to exchange Chinese money into German currency please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . How much will you be exchanging today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about 50,000 RIB . Would that be a problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a hefty amount . But that should have no problem at all . You should be aware that there is a ten-percent service charge , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ten percent ! Now that ’ s hefty !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute ... do you have an account with us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes I do; here is my account number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For members , there is a small transaction charge , but it ’ s only 5 dollars per transaction . Any particular denomination ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 3,000 marks in hundreds and the rest in tens and twenty ’ s , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are Mr . Lee . Will there be anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2
